TopicTitle: What happend to the Space:1999 Eagle?

Articles.Content: I remember seeing footage of the Eagle from Space:1999 in KSP. Has that project been abandoned or is it hiding in some deep, dark corner of the Internet?

I found it not long ago on the forum but it was a craft file only and lacked the needed mod.

I found this one http://............/eagle-transporter-sp-1999-mod/

but never head of the site so I am a little afraid to download.

If you find one that works in 1.04, I would love to know.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24677

Edited May 19, 2021 by Snark
Link to defunct website removed by moderator
Thanks to both of you guys for the fast response. It's also good to see that it seems that Wayland is updating stuff as well.
